          <title>
            <string language="sl">Mikroskopski pogled na serijsko in vzporedno vezane kondenzatorje</string>
            <string language="en">Microscopic View of Capacitors in Series and Parallel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroskopische Ansicht der Kondensatoren in den 
Serien und in der Ähnlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vue microscopique des condensateurs en série et 
le parallèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista microscópica dos capacitores em série e a
paralela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vista microscopica dei condensatori in serie ed 
il parallelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροσκοπική όψη των πυκνωτών στη σειρά και τον 
παράλληλο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vista microscópica de condensadores en series y 
paralelo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prerez kondenzatorja in vpliv razlike zaporedne/vzporedne vezave.</string>
            <string language="en">Capacitor and its behavior in a circuit when connected parallel or serially.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensateur et son comportement dans un circuit 
quand parallèle relié ou séquentiel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capacitor e seu comportamento em um circuito

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensador y su comportamiento en un circuito
